nodes.text: In 1 ABY, Trandoshan slavers of the Blackscale Clan under the command of slaver master Klesk had set up a camp in the southern part of the Etyyy region on Kashyyyk. It consisted of three large tents and was guarded by well-armed Blackscale guards.
A spacer sent by the Trandoshan Mosolium of the rival Zssik Clan ventured to this camp and killed Klesk and several of his slavers to acquire access codes to the Avatar Platform.
